Package DAO

Class appointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.appointmentDAO
public abstract class appointmentDAO extends Object
Appointment Data Access Object. Runs SQL queries on the Appointments table and return results. SQLException: Column 'Created_Date' not found. Fix: Typo in name. 'Create_Date'.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppts() throws SQLException
      Returns:
      List of all appointments. Creates appointment objects for each Appointment currently in the database, and adds them to an observable array.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Sql error exceptions. ERROR: SQLException: Column 'Created_Date' not found. Fixed by changing to 'Create_Date' Attempt#1: My error was that I was pulling in a Timestamp as a timestamp, which gets auto-converted to local time. I decided to switch to the value of the timestamp given the string in the database. Makes more sense. I was very confused about how MST would add two hours. I focused too much time trying to fix my setters and getters in my Appointments class.

    • getWeekly

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getWeekly() throws SQLException
      Returns:
      an Observable array list of all the weekly appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception handler for SQL errors.

    • getMonthly

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonthly() throws SQLException
      Returns:
      an Observable List of monthly appointments for the monthly filter.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception handler for SQL errors.

    • createAppt

      public static void createAppt(String Title, String Description, String Location, String Type, LocalDate apptDate, LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime, Integer customerID, Integer userID, Integer contactID) throws SQLException
      Database Access Object for creating the appointments. Creates a prepared statement based on the overloaded params.
      Parameters:
      Title - The title of the appointment.
      Description - The description of the appointment.
      Location - The location of the appointment.
      Type - The type of appointment.
      apptDate - The date of the appointment.
      startTime - The start time of the appointment.
      endTime - The end time of the appointment.
      customerID - The customer's ID.
      userID - The user's ID.
      contactID - The contact's ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception handler for sql errors.

    • updateAppt

      public static void updateAppt(Integer apptID, String Title, String Description, String Location, String Type, LocalDate apptDate, LocalTime Start, LocalTime End, Timestamp last_update, String last_updated_by, Integer customerId, Integer userId, Integer contactId) throws SQLException
      DAO for updating the appointments using the overloaded params.
      Parameters:
      apptID - Appointment ID.
      Title - Appointment Title.
      Description - Appointment description.
      Location - Appointment location.
      Type - Appointment type.
      apptDate - Appointment date.
      Start - Appointment start time.
      End - Appointment end time.
      last_update - Appointment last update timestamp.
      last_updated_by - Appointment last updated by.
      customerId - customer ID.
      userId - User ID.
      contactId - Contact ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception handler.

    • deleteAppt

      public static void deleteAppt(Integer apptID) throws SQLException

      Parameters:

      Throws:

      Returns:
      boolean value based on if customer ID exists.
